About.Hours & facilities: Open Tues and Thurs 10am-4pm (appointment required); closed public holidays. General reference assistance available. Copying services for books, journals and photographs available. Introductory brochure available.

About.Access: 1 week's advance notice of visit required. Research topic should be outlined by letter or telephone.

About.Acquisition focus: Australian performing arts with a particular focus on all forms of popular entertainment.

About.Major holdings:
J C Williamson: Documents, programs, photographs 1900-1980.
	Barry Humphries: Documents, programs, photographs, artwork 1960-
	Dame Nellie Melba: Correspondence, programs, photographs 1880-1930.
	Aztec Services -Beatles Australian Tour: Documents 1964.
	Bert Myer Chevron Hotel Collection: Documents, photographs, artwork 1955-1970.
	Handspan Theatre: Documents, photographs, diaries, posters 1980. Holden Brothers Circus: Documents, posters, flyers.
	Fowler's Australian Dramatic Players: Documents, posters, flyers, notebooks.
